text: ao mcheasa robsakhnhom. pitabrakd nasa puokvea( roubsaamnak) ban thveu aoy mnoussa lok cheachraen v nge v ng . haey bokkol na del ban tam( meakra)khnhom ku bokkol noh pitchea sthetnow knong krom robsakhnhom . rie bokkol na del ban brachheang nung( meakra) khnhom vinh ku trong pitchea mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
